bookAuthors: Deborah Howe, James Howe, Alan Daniel
Plot: BEWARE THE HARE! Is he or isn't he a vampire? Before it's too late, Harold the dog and Chester the cat must find out the truth about the newest pet in the Monroe household -- a suspicious-looking bunny with unusual habits... and fangs!
Characters: Harold (Bunnicula), Bunnicula, Chester (Bunnicula), Robert Monroe, Ann Monroe, Peter Monroe, Toby Monroe
